displayName: Ensure 'PASSWORD_REUSE_TIME' Is Greater than or Equal to '365' in user profile
rationale: Reusing the same password after only a short period of time has passed makes the success of brute-force login attacks more likely.
recommended_action:
Remediate this setting by executing the following SQL statement for each `PROFILE` returned by the audit procedure.
```
ALTER PROFILE <profile_name> LIMIT PASSWORD_REUSE_TIME 365;
```
error_message: Passwords can be reused less than 365 days, after initial use
ruleNames: Ensure 'PASSWORD_REUSE_TIME' Is Greater than or Equal to '365' in user profile
